 ## INSTALLATION
 
 ```
# Clone this repository
$ git clone https://github.com/Rodolpho-Oliveira/projeto-mars-front.git

# Go into the repository
$ cd projeto-rover-front

# Install dependencies
$ npm install

 ```
 
 ## USAGE
 
 ```
 # Run the app
 $ npm run dev
 ```
